ContextFilter.description: Honestly don't know what the format of this argument should be, but there's a request that requires it so it defaults to always empty.

PerMode.description: Whether returned stats should be given as totals, per game, per 36 minutes, etc. Some requests may not accept all values of this argument, however "Totals" and "PerGame" are always permitted.

RookieYear.description: (Guess) Include only players with the given rookie year?

SeasonID.description: From the perspective of the user this is the same as :ref:`Season <param-season>`, though it is handled differently internally.

SeasonType.description: Some requests may not support pre-season.

league-leaders.description: .. warning:: This request cannot be executed due to issues with the current implementation of NBAWebStats. These issues will likely be addressed by upcoming versions of NBAWebStats at which point the request will become available.

league-clutch-stats.description: .. warning:: This request cannot be executed due to issues with the current implementation of NBAWebStats. These issues will likely be addressed by upcoming versions of NBAWebStats at which point the request will become available.

league-team-shot-locations.description: .. warning:: This request cannot be executed due to issues with the current implementation of NBAWebStats. These issues will likely be addressed by upcoming versions of NBAWebStats at which point the request will become available.
